ILEX: How Projection Walls Work

1
ILEX: Projection walls allow Nomai to talk to each other without being in the same place. It's a wonderful technology for talking to friends from far away!
3
2
ILEX: To use a projection wall, a projection stone must first be placed into its pedestal. This allows connection to the stone's corresponding projection wall, sharing anything written on both walls!
4
3
ILEX: Incoming messages from the other projection wall are always displayed in an orange color! This makes it easy to always tell which side is talking.

4
FILIX: A concise and informative report, Ilex! But did you know that projection walls were recreated after the way our Vessel's communications used to work?
6
5
ILEX: Really? I never knew that!

6
FILIX: It's true! Though unable to connect to the Vessels' communication network, the projection walls are an iteration on its design, which separated incoming and outgoing messages on different walls.

ILEX: New projection stones are crafted at the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> every day, allowing us to talk and project to more and more places!
